trans-unit.source: Configures the output cache settings for application pages .
trans-unit.target: 設定應用程式頁面的輸出快取設定。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `outputCacheSettings` element of the `caching` section in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`outputCacheSettings`元素`caching`組態檔中的區段。

trans-unit.source: The output cache settings define the dependencies (the relationships between items stored in the cache and files, cache keys, or <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> objects) that are used in output caching, for instance, by the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取設定定義的相依性 (儲存在快取和快取金鑰的檔案中的項目之間的關聯性或<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件)，用於輸出快取，比方說，由[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞或由<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.MachineToApplication>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>可將資訊寫入至 [區段] 屬性所定義的限制根據組態檔的相關區段<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其實<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.MachineToApplication>。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser.
trans-unit.target: 任何嘗試寫入組態檔不允許在階層中的層級，將會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取階層架構中的任何層級的組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfileCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfileCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfileCollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile" /> objects
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfileCollection" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile" />

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A> property allows you to programmatically access the `outputCacheProfiles` element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A>屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取`outputCacheProfiles`組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A> property to modify the `outputCacheProfiles` element programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A>屬性以修改`outputCacheProfiles`項目以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The `outputCacheProfiles` section contains <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> objects that represent output cache settings that may be used by pages in the application.
trans-unit.target: `outputCacheProfiles`區段包含<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>物件，表示輸出快取設定，可能會由應用程式中的頁面。

trans-unit.source: These settings can be applied to a page by setting the `CacheProfile` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定可以藉由設定套用至頁面`CacheProfile`屬性[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞。

trans-unit.source: Apply the profile to control caching attributes such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time.
trans-unit.target: 套用設定檔，以控制快取相依性、 快取區位置和快取過期時間 」 等屬性。

trans-unit.source: The [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive can override all the settings contained by an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> except the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞可以覆寫所包含的所有設定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>除了<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile.Enabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is to ensure you can enable or disable the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it.
trans-unit.target: 這是為了確保您可以啟用或停用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>而不需要修改可能會覆寫它的所有頁面中的指示詞。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A> 屬性。
